Class ApplicationExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
com.fitnessforge.ApplicationExceptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware
@ControllerAdvice public class ApplicationExceptionHandler extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
Description:

Central Application Exception handler for handling exceptions occuring throughout the application
